childMarkdownRemark.html:
This is my first post on gatsby

For long time, I have been using frameworks like Wordpress in order to set up my own website. Recently I learned about gatsby and I decided to give it a try.

I designed this website starting from @r-ichard/gatsby-starter-bootstrap-5 and I customized it as I wanted. The flexibility of gatsby is amazing, I can easily add new pages and posts and I can also customize the theme as I want.
